## ğŸ¯ NEXT: FEATURE 24 â€” Asset Upload with Hybrid Storage (Local + Cloud Fallback)

This is the most complex feature. It enables users to actually upload assets with proper image handling.

**artifacts**

*Request*

````javascript
{
  "id": "feature_24_hybrid_storage",
  "type": "text/markdown",
  "command": "create",
  "content": "# FEATURE 24 â€” Asset Upload with Hybrid Storage (Local + Cloud Fallback)\n\n## ğŸ¯ GOALS (LOCKED)\n\nBy the end of this feature:\n- Users can upload multiple asset images (1-5 images)\n- Images stored locally by default\n- Images stored in cloud (AWS S3 / Google Cloud) if credentials available\n- Automatic fallback to local if cloud fails\n- Upload progress shown to user\n- Error handling for failed uploads\n- File validation (type, size, count)\n\n---\n\n## ğŸ§± BACKEND IMPLEMENTATION\n\n### Step 1: Install Dependencies\n\n```bash\ncd server\nnpm install multer aws-sdk\nnpm install -D @types/multer\n```\n\n- `multer`: Handle multipart/form-data file uploads\n- `aws-sdk`: AWS S3 integration (optional, only if using cloud)\n\n---\n\n### Step 2: Create Storage Config\n\n**File:** `server/src/config/storage.ts`\n\n```typescript\nimport dotenv from \"dotenv\"\n\ndotenv.config()\n\nexport interface StorageConfig {\n  local: {\n    enabled: boolean\n    path: string\n  }\n  cloud: {\n    enabled: boolean\n    provider: \"s3\" | \"gcs\" | null\n    s3?: {\n      accessKeyId: string\n      secretAccessKey: string\n      region: string\n      bucket: string\n    }\n    gcs?: {\n      projectId: string\n      keyFile: string\n      bucket: string\n    }\n  }\n}\n\nexport const storageConfig: StorageConfig = {\n  local: {\n    enabled: true,\n    path: process.env.UPLOAD_DIR || \"./uploads/assets\"\n  },\n  cloud: {\n    enabled: !!(process.env.CLOUD_PROVIDER && \n               (process.env.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID || process.env.GCS_PROJECT_ID)),\n    provider: (process.env.CLOUD_PROVIDER as \"s3\" | \"gcs\") || null,\n    s3: process.env.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID ? {\n      accessKeyId: process.env.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID,\n      secretAccessKey: process.env.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY || \"\",\n      region: process.env.AWS_REGION || \"us-east-1\",\n      bucket: process.env.AWS_S3_BUCKET || \"\"\n    } : undefined,\n    gcs: process.env.GCS_PROJECT_ID ? {\n      projectId: process.env.GCS_PROJECT_ID,\n      keyFile: process.env.GCS_KEY_FILE || \"\",\n      bucket: process.env.GCS_BUCKET || \"\"\n    } : undefined\n  }\n}\n\nexport function isCloudEnabled(): boolean {\n  return storageConfig.cloud.enabled && storageConfig.cloud.provider !== null\n}\n\nexport function isLocalEnabled(): boolean {\n  return storageConfig.local.enabled\n}\n```\n\n---\n\n### Step 3: Create Storage Service\n\n**File:** `server/src/services/storage.service.ts`\n\n```typescript\nimport fs from \"fs\"\nimport path from \"path\"\nimport AWS from \"aws-sdk\"\nimport { storageConfig, isCloudEnabled, isLocalEnabled } from \"@/config/storage\"\n\nexport interface UploadResult {\n  url: string\n  isCloud: boolean\n  error?: string\n}\n\n// Configure S3 if enabled\nlet s3Client: AWS.S3 | null = null\nif (isCloudEnabled() && storageConfig.cloud.provider === \"s3\" && storageConfig.cloud.s3) {\n  s3Client = new AWS.S3({\n    accessKeyId: storageConfig.cloud.s3.accessKeyId,\n    secretAccessKey: storageConfig.cloud.s3.secretAccessKey,\n    region: storageConfig.cloud.s3.region\n  })\n}\n\nexport async function uploadAssetImage(\n  file: Express.Multer.File,\n  directory: string = \"assets\"\n): Promise<UploadResult> {\n  if (!file) {\n    throw new Error(\"No file provided\")\n  }\n\n  // Validate file type\n  const allowedMimes = [\"image/jpeg\", \"image/png\", \"image/webp\", \"image/gif\"]\n  if (!allowedMimes.includes(file.mimetype)) {\n    throw new Error(\"Invalid file type. Only JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF allowed.\")\n  }\n\n  // Validate file size (5MB max)\n  const maxSize = 5 * 1024 * 1024\n  if (file.size > maxSize) {\n    throw new Error(\"File size exceeds 5MB limit\")\n  }\n\n  // Try cloud upload first\n  if (isCloudEnabled()) {\n    try {\n      const cloudUrl = await uploadToCloud(file, directory)\n      return {\n        url: cloudUrl,\n        isCloud: true\n      }\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.warn(\"Cloud upload failed, falling back to local storage:\", error)\n    }\n  }\n\n  // Fallback to local storage\n  if (isLocalEnabled()) {\n    const localUrl = uploadToLocal(file, directory)\n    return {\n      url: localUrl,\n      isCloud: false\n    }\n  }\n\n  throw new Error(\"No storage backend available\")\n}\n\nasync function uploadToCloud(\n  file: Express.Multer.File,\n  directory: string\n): Promise<string> {\n  if (!s3Client || !storageConfig.cloud.s3) {\n    throw new Error(\"S3 not configured\")\n  }\n\n  const filename = `${Date.now()}-${file.originalname}`\n  const key = `${directory}/${filename}`\n\n  const params: AWS.S3.PutObjectRequest = {\n    Bucket: storageConfig.cloud.s3.bucket,\n    Key: key,\n    Body: file.buffer,\n    ContentType: file.mimetype,\n    ACL: \"public-read\"\n  }\n\n  const result = await s3Client.upload(params).promise()\n  return result.Location\n}\n\nfunction uploadToLocal(file: Express.Multer.File, directory: string): string {\n  const uploadDir = path.join(storageConfig.local.path, directory)\n\n  // Create directory if doesn't exist\n  if (!fs.existsSync(uploadDir)) {\n    fs.mkdirSync(uploadDir, { recursive: true })\n  }\n\n  const filename = `${Date.now()}-${file.originalname}`\n  const filepath = path.join(uploadDir, filename)\n\n  // Write file\n  fs.writeFileSync(filepath, file.buffer)\n\n  // Return URL (relative to server root)\n  return `${process.env.SERVER_URL || \"http://localhost:4000\"}/uploads/${directory}/${filename}`\n}\n\nexport async function deleteAssetImage(url: string): Promise<void> {\n  if (url.includes(\"s3\") || url.includes(\"googleapis\")) {\n    // Cloud deletion (optional, skip for MVP)\n    return\n  }\n\n  // Local deletion\n  const filename = url.split(\"/\").pop()\n  if (filename) {\n    const filepath = path.join(storageConfig.local.path, filename)\n    if (fs.existsSync(filepath)) {\n      fs.unlinkSync(filepath)\n    }\n  }\n}\n```\n\n---\n\n### Step 4: Create Upload Routes\n\n**File:** `server/src/routes/upload.routes.ts`\n\n```typescript\nimport { Router } from \"express\"\nimport multer from \"multer\"\nimport { uploadAssetImage } from \"@/services/storage.service\"\nimport { authenticate } from \"@/middlewares/auth.middleware\"\n\nconst router = Router()\n\n// Configure multer (memory storage)\nconst upload = multer({\n  storage: multer.memoryStorage(),\n  limits: {\n    fileSize: 5 * 1024 * 1024 // 5MB\n  }\n})\n\nrouter.post(\n  \"/asset-images\",\n  authenticate,\n  upload.array(\"images\", 5), // Max 5 images\n  async (req, res) => {\n    try {\n      const files = req.files as Express.Multer.File[]\n\n      if (!files || files.length === 0) {\n        return res.status(400).json({ error: \"No files uploaded\" })\n      }\n\n      const uploadResults = await Promise.all(\n        files.map(file => uploadAssetImage(file, \"assets\"))\n      )\n\n      const urls = uploadResults.map(result => result.url)\n\n      res.json({\n        urls,\n        message: `${urls.length} image(s) uploaded successfully`,\n        storage: uploadResults[0]?.isCloud ? \"cloud\" : \"local\"\n      })\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error(\"Upload error:\", error)\n      res.status(500).json({\n        error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : \"Upload failed\"\n      })\n    }\n  }\n)\n\nexport default router\n```\n\n---\n\n### Step 5: Register Routes in App\n\n**File:** `server/src/app.ts` (UPDATE)\n\n```typescript\nimport uploadRoutes from \"./routes/upload.routes\"\n\n// ... other middleware ...\n\napp.use(\"/api/v1/upload\", uploadRoutes)\n\n// Static file serving for local uploads\napp.use(\"/uploads\", express.static(\"./uploads\"))\n```\n\n---\n\n### Step 6: Environment Variables\n\n**File:** `.env` (server)\n\n```\n# Storage Configuration\nUPLOAD_DIR=./uploads\n\n# For local storage only (default):\n# Leave these empty\n\n# For AWS S3 (optional):\nCLOUD_PROVIDER=s3\nAWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=your_key_here\nAWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=your_secret_here\nAWS_S3_BUCKET=your-bucket-name\nAWS_REGION=us-east-1\nSERVER_URL=http://localhost:4000\n\n# For IMPLEMENTATION\n\n### Component: AssetUploadInput.tsx (NEW)\n\n**File:** `client/src/components/assets/AssetUploadInput.tsx`\n\n```typescript\nimport { useState } from \"react\"\nimport { Upload, X } from \"lucide-react\"\nimport { Button } from \"@/components/ui/button\"\nimport { Progress } from \"@/components/ui/progress\"\nimport { toast } from \"sonner\"\nimport { api } from \"@/lib/api\"\n\ninterface AssetUploadInputProps {\n  onUpload: (urls: string[]) => void\n  maxFiles?: number\n}\n\nexport function AssetUploadInput({ onUpload, maxFiles = 5 }: AssetUploadInputProps) {\n  const [files, setFiles] = useState<File[]>([])\n  const [uploading, setUploading] = useState(false)\n  const [progress, setProgress] = useState(0)\n\n  const handleDrop = (e: React.DragEvent<HTMLDivElement>) => {\n    e.preventDefault()\n    e.stopPropagation()\n\n    const droppedFiles = Array.from(e.dataTransfer.files)\n    addFiles(droppedFiles)\n  }\n\n  const handleFileInput = (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {\n    const selectedFiles = Array.from(e.target.files || [])\n    addFiles(selectedFiles)\n  }\n\n  const addFiles = (newFiles: File[]) => {\n    // Validate file types\n    const imageFiles = newFiles.filter(file =>\n      file.type.startsWith(\"image/\")\n    )\n\n    if (imageFiles.length !== newFiles.length) {\n      toast.error(\"Only image files are allowed\")\n    }\n\n    // Check total count\n    if (files.length + imageFiles.length > maxFiles) {\n      toast.error(`Maximum ${maxFiles} files allowed`)\n      return\n    }\n\n    setFiles(prev => [...prev, ...imageFiles])\n  }\n\n  const removeFile = (index: number) => {\n    setFiles(prev => prev.filter((_, i) => i !== index))\n  }\n\n  const handleUpload = async () => {\n    if (files.length === 0) {\n      toast.error(\"No files selected\")\n      return\n    }\n\n    setUploading(true)\n    setProgress(0)\n\n    try {\n      const formData = new FormData()\n      files.forEach(file => formData.append(\"images\", file))\n\n      const { urls } = await api.post(\"/upload/asset-images\", formData, {\n        headers: {\n          \"Content-Type\": \"multipart/form-data\"\n        },\n        onUploadProgress: (event: any) => {\n          if (event.total) {\n            const progressPercent = Math.round((event.loaded / event.total) * 100)\n            setProgress(progressPercent)\n          }\n        }\n      })\n\n      toast.success(`${urls.length} image(s) uploaded successfully!`)\n      onUpload(urls)\n      setFiles([])\n      setProgress(0)\n    } catch (error) {\n      const message = error instanceof Error ? error.message : \"Upload failed\"\n      toast.error(message)\n      console.error(\"Upload error:\", error)\n    } finally {\n      setUploading(false)\n    }\n  }\n\n  return (\n    <div className=\"w-full max-w-2xl mx-auto\">\n      {/* Drop zone */}\n      <div\n        onDrop={handleDrop}\n        onDragOver={e => e.preventDefault()}\n        className=\"border-2 border-dashed border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 rounded-lg p-8 text-center \n                   hover:border-gray-400 dark:hover:border-gray-500 transition-colors cursor-pointer\n                   bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-900\"\n      >\n        <Upload className=\"w-8 h-8 mx-auto mb-2 accept=\"image/*\"\n          onChange={handleFileInput}\n          className=\"hidden\"\n          id=\"file-input\"\n        />\n        <label htmlFor=\"file-input\" className=\"cursor-pointer\">\n          <Button variant=\"outline\" className=\"mt-4\" asChild>\n            <span>Select Files</span>\n          </Button>\n        </label>\n      </div>\n\n      {/* Selected files preview */}\n      {files.length > 0 && (\n        <div className=\"mt-6\">\n          <h3 className=\"text-sm font-medium mb-3\">\n            Selected Files ({files.length}/{maxFiles})\n          </h3>\n\n          <div className=\"space-y-2\">\n            {files.map((file, idx) => (\n              <div\n                key={idx}\n                className=\"flex items-center justify-between p-3 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-800 rounded border\"\n              >\n                <span className=\"text-sm text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 truncate\">\n                  {file.name}\n                </span>\n                <button\n                  onClick={() => removeFile(idx)}\n                  disabled={uploading}\n                  className=\"text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-600 dark:hover:text-gray-300\"\n                >\n                  <X className=\"w-4 h-4\" />\n                </button>\n              </div>\n            ))}\n          </div>\n\n          {/* Upload progress */}\n          {uploading && (\n            <div className=\"mt-4\">\n              <Progress value={progress} className=\"h-2\" />\n              <p className=\"text-xs text-gray-500 mt-1\">{progress}% uploaded</p>\n            </div>\n          )}\n\n          {/* Upload button */}\n          <Button\n            onClick={handleUpload}\n            disabled={uploading}\n            className=\"mt-4 w-full\"\n          >\n            {uploading ? `Uploading... (${progress}%)` : \"Upload Images\"}\n          </Button>\n        </div>\n      )}\n    </div>\n  )\n}\n```\n\n---\n\n### Update API Types\n\n**File:** `client/src/lib/api.ts` 2. Storage Service (

The core logic handles the upload process. It attempts cloud upload first (if enabled) and silently falls back to local storage on failure, ensuring high availability.

```
// Fallback Logic
```

if (isCloudEnabled()) {
try {
return await uploadToCloud(file, directory)
  } catch (error) {
console.warn("Cloud upload failed, falling back to local...")
  }
}
// Local storage fallback
return uploadToLocal(file, directory)

.set(\"Authorization\", `Bearer ${authToken}`)\n      .send({\n        assetId: approvedAssetId,\n        startTime: startTime.toISOString(),\n        endTime: endTime.toISOString()\n      })\n\n Date(startTime.getTime() + 25 * 60 * 60 * 1000) // 25 hours\n\n    const response = await request(app)\n      .post(\"/api/v1/auctions\")\n      .set(\"Authorization\", `Bearer ${authToken}`)\n # Walkthrough - Feature 26: Schedule Auction Page

- **New Test Suite** (`server/tests/auctions/schedule.test.ts`):
  - Verified successful auction creation.
  - Verified rejection of past start times.
  - Verified rejection of >24 hour durations.

=> (prev === 0 ? images.length - 1 : prev - 1))\n  }\n\n  const goToNext = () => {\n    setCurrentIndex((prev) => (prev === images.length - 1 ? 0 : prev + 1))\n  }\n\n  if (!images || images.length     />\n\n        {/* Navigation arrows */}\n        {images.length > 1 && (\n          <>\n            <Button\n              variant=\"ghost\"\n              size=\"icon\"\n />\n            </Button>\n          </>\n        )}\n\n        {/* Image counter */}\n        {images.length > 1 && (\n          <div className=\"absolute bottom-4 right-4 bg-black/70 text-white px-3 className={`flex-shrink-0 w-16 h-16 rounded border-2 overflow-hidden transition-all ${\n                idx === currentIndex\n                  ? \"border-blue-500\"\n                  : \"react-router-dom\"\nimport { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from \"@/components/ui/card\"\nimport { Button } from \"@/components/ui/button\"\nimport { Badge } from \"@/components/ui/badge\"\nimport { Clock, CheckCircle, XCircle } from \"lucide-react\"\n\ninterface Auction {\n  id: string\n  status: \"SCHEDULED\" | \"LIVE\" | \"ENDED\" | \"CANCELLED\"\n  startTime: string\n  endTime: string\n}\n\ninterface AuctionStatusProps {\n  auction?: Auction\n  assetStatus: string\n}\n\nexport function AuctionStatus({ auction, assetStatus }: AuctionStatusProps) {\n  if (assetStatus !== \"APPROVED\") {\n    return (\n      <Card className=\"bg-yellow-50 dark:bg-yellow-900/20 border-yellow-200 dark:border-yellow-800\">\n        <CardContent className=\"p-6\">\n          <p className=\"text-sm text-yellow-800 dark:text-yellow-200\">\n            âš ï¸ This asset is under admin review. Check back soon!\n          </p>\n        </CardContent>\n      </Card>\n    )\n  }\n\n  if (!auction) {\n    return (\n      <Card className=\"bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-900\">\n        <CardContent className=\"p-6\">\n          <p className=\"text-sm text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400\">\n            No active auction scheduled for this item yet.\n          </p>\n        </CardContent>\n      </Card>\n    )\n  }\n\n  const now = new Date()\n  const startTime = new Date(auction.startTime)\n  const endTime = new Date(auction.endTime)\n\n  let status = auction.status\n  let statusColor = \"bg-gray-50\"\n  let statusIcon = null\n  let statusText = \"\"\n\n  if (auction.status === \"CANCELLED\") {\n    statusColor = \"bg-red-50 dark:bg-red-900/20\"\n    statusIcon = <XCircle className=\"w-5 h-5 text-red-600 dark:text-red-400\" />\n    statusText = \"This auction was cancelled\"\n  } else if (auction.status === \"LIVE\") {\n    statusColor = \"bg-green-50 dark:bg-green-900/20\"\n    statusIcon = <CheckCircle className=\"w-5 h-5 text-green-600 dark:text-green-400\" />\n    statusText = `Live! Ends ${formatTime(endTime)}`\n  } else if (auction.status === \"SCHEDULED\") {\n    statusColor = \"bg-blue-50 dark:bg-blue-900/20\"\n    statusIcon = <Clock className=\"w-5 h-5 text-blue-600 dark:text-blue-400\" />\n    statusText = `Starts ${formatTime(startTime)}`\n  } else if (auction.status === \"ENDED\") {\n    statusColor = \"bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-900\"\n    statusText = \"This auction has ended\"\n  }\n\n  return (\n    <Card className={statusColor}>\n      <CardHeader>\n        <CardTitle className=\"text-base flex items-center gap-2\">\n          {statusIcon}\n          Auction Details\n        </CardTitle>\n      </CardHeader>\n      <CardContent className=\"space-y-4\">\n        <div>\n          <Badge variant={auction.status === \"LIVE\" ? \"default\" : \"secondary\"}>\n            {auction.status}\n          </Badge>\n          <p className=\"text-sm mt-2\">{statusText}</p>\n        </div>\n\n        {auction.status === \"LIVE\" && (\n          <Button className=\"w-full\" asChild>\n            <Link to={`/auctions/${auction.id}`}>\n              View & Bid on Auction\n            </Link>\n          </Button>\n        )}\n\n        {auction.status === \"SCHEDULED\" && (\n          <Button variant=\"outline\" className=\"w-full\" asChild>\n            <Link to={`/auctions/${auction.id}`}>\n              View Auction Details\n            </Link>\n          </Button>\n        )}\n\n        {auction.status === \"ENDED\" && (\n          <Button variant=\"outline\" className=\"w-full\" asChild>\n            <Link to={`/auctions/${auction.id}`}>\n              View Results\n            </Link>\n          </Button>\n        )}\n      </CardContent>\n    </Card>\n  )\n}\n\nfunction formatTime(date: Date): string {\n  const now = new Date()\n  const diff = date.getTime() - now.getTime()\n  const days = Math.floor(diff / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24))\n  const hours = Math.floor((diff % (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60))\n\n  if (days > 0) return `in ${days}d ${hours}h`\n  if (hours > 0) return `in ${hours}h`\n  return \"soon\"\n}\n```\n\n---\n\n### Component 4: RelatedItems.tsx (NEW)\n\n**File:**        .slice(0, 4)\n    }\n  })\n\n  if (isLoading) {\n    return (\n      <div>\n        <h2 className=\"text-2xl font-bold mb-6\">More from this Seller</h2>\n        <div className=\"grid </div>\n    )\n  }\n\n  if (!assets || assets.length === 0) {\n    return null\n  }\n\n  return (\n    <div>\n      <h2 className=\"text-2xl font-bold mb-6\">More from this Seller</h2>\n      <div className=\"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4\">\n        {assets.map(asset => (\n          <AssetCard key={asset.id} asset={asset} />\n        ))}\n      </div>\n    </div>\n  )\n}\n```\n\n---\n\n### Component 5: MetadataDisplay.tsx (NEW)\n\n**File:** `client/src/components/assets/MetadataDisplay.tsx`\n\n```typescript\nimport { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } }\n}\n\nexport function MetadataDisplay({ metadata }: MetadataDisplayProps) {\n  if (!metadata || Object.keys(metadata).length === 0) {\n    return null\n  }\n\n  const displayFields = [\n    { key: SELLER)\n\n**File:** `client/src/components/dashboard/RecentAuctionsTable.tsx`\n\n```typescript\nimport { useQuery } from \"@tanstack/react-query\"\nimport { useNavigate } from \"react-router-dom\"\nimport { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from \"@/components/ui/card\"\nimport { Button } from \"@/components/ui/button\"\nimport { Badge } from \"@/components/ui/badge\"\nimport { Skeleton } from \"@/components/ui/skeleton\"\nimport { ArrowRight } from \"lucide-react\"\nimport { api } from \"@/lib/api\"\n\ninterface Auction {\n  id: string\n  asset: { title: string }\n  status: \"SCHEDULED\" | \"LIVE\" | \"ENDED\" | \"CANCELLED\"\n  startTime: string\n  endTime: string\n  createdAt: string\n}\n\nexport function RecentAuctionsTable() {\n  const navigate = useNavigate()\n\n  const { data: auctions, isLoading } = useQuery({\n    queryKey: [\"my-auctions\"],\n    queryFn: async () => {\n      const response = await api.get(\"/auctions\", {\n        params: { sellerId: \"current-user\" } // API should support this\n      })\n      // Return only seller's auctions, sorted by date\n      return response.data\n        .filter((a: Auction) => a.status !== \"CANCELLED\")\n        .sort((a: Auction, b: Auction) => \n          new Date(b.createdAt).getTime() - new Date(a.createdAt).getTime()\n        )\n        .slice(0, 5) // Last 5 auctions\n    }\n  })\n\n  if (isLoading) {\n    return (\n      <Card>\n        <CardHeader>\n          <CardTitle>Recent Auctions</CardTitle>\n        </CardHeader>\n        <CardContent>\n          <div className=\"space-y-3\">\n            {[1, 2, 3].map(i => (\n              <Skeleton key={i} className=\"h-12 w-full\" />\n            ))}\n          </div>\n        </CardContent>\n      </Card>\n    )\n  }\n\n  if (!auctions || auctions.length === 0) {\n    return (\n      <Card>\n        <CardHeader>\n          <CardTitle>Recent Auctions</CardTitle>\n        </CardHeader>\n        <CardContent>\n          <p className=\"text-sm text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400\">\n            No auctions yet. BIDDER)\n\n**File:** `client/src/components/dashboard/ActiveBidsTable.tsx`\n\n```typescript\nimport { useEffect, useState } from \"react\"\nimport { useQuery } from \"@tanstack/react-query\"\nimport { useNavigate } from \"react-router-dom\"\nimport { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from \"@/components/ui/card\"\nimport { Button } from \"@/components/ui/button\"\nimport { Badge } from \"@/components/ui/badge\"\nimport { Skeleton } from \"@/components/ui/skeleton\"\nimport { ArrowRight, Clock } from \"lucide-react\"\nimport { api } from \"@/lib/api\"\n\ninterface Bid {\n  id: string\n  amount: number\n  auction: {\n    id: string\n    asset: { title: string }\n    endTime: string\n    status: string\n  }\n}\n\nexport function ActiveBidsTable() {\n  const navigate = useNavigate()\n  const [countdowns, setCountdowns] = useState<Record<string, string>>({})\n\n  const { data: bids, isLoading } = useQuery({\n    queryKey: [\"my-active-bids\"],\n    queryFn: async () => {\n      const response = await api.get(\"/bids\")\n      // Filter for active bids only (auction is LIVE)\n      return response.data\n        .filter((bid: Bid) => bid.auction.status === \"LIVE\")\n        .sort((a: Bid, b: Bid) =>\n          new Date(b.auction.endTime).getTime() - \n          new Date(a.auction.endTime).getTime()\n        )\n        .slice(0, 5)\n    }\n  })\n\n  // Update countdowns every second\n  useEffect(() => {\n    if (!bids) return\n\n    const interval = setInterval(() => {\n      const newCountdowns: Record<string, string> = {}\n      bids.forEach((bid: Bid) => {\n        const endTime = new Date(bid.auction.endTime)\n        const now = new Date()\n        const diff = endTime.getTime() - now.getTime()\n\n        if (diff <= 0) {\n          newCountdowns[bid.id] = \"Ended\"\n        } else {\n          const hours = Math.floor(diff / (1000 * 60 * 60))\n          const minutes = Math.floor((diff % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60))\n          const seconds = Math.floor((diff % (1000 * 60)) / 1000)\n\n          if (hours > 0) {\n            newCountdowns[bid.id] = `${hours}h ${minutes}m`\n          } else if (minutes > 0) {\n            newCountdowns[bid.id] = `${minutes}m ${seconds}s`\n          } else {\n            newCountdowns[bid.id] = `${seconds}s`\n          }\n        }\n      })\n      setCountdowns(newCountdowns)\n    }, 1000)\n\n    return () => clearInterval(interval)\n  }, [bids])\n\n  if (isLoading) {\n    return (\n      <Card>\n        <CardHeader>\n          <CardTitle>Active Bids</CardTitle>\n        </CardHeader>\n        <CardContent>\n          <div className=\"space-y-3\">\n            {[1, 2, 3].map(i => (\n              <Skeleton key={i} className=\"h-12 w-full\" />\n            ))}\n          </div>\n        </CardContent>\n      </Card>\n    )\n  }\n\n  if (!bids || bids.length === 0) {\n    return (\n      <Card>\n        <CardHeader>\n          <CardTitle>Active Bids</CardTitle>\n        </CardHeader>\n        <CardContent>\n          <p className=\"text-sm text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400\">\n            No active bids. Explore auctions to bid.\n          </p>\n        </CardContent>\n      </Card>\n    )\n  }\n\n  return (\n    <Card>\n      <CardHeader>\n        <CardTitle>Active Bids</CardTitle>\n      </CardHeader>\n      <CardContent>\n        <div className=\"space-y-3\">\n          {bids.map((bid: Bid) => (\n            <div\n              key={bid.id}\n              className=\"flex items-center justify-between p-3 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-800 rounded border hover:border-blue-300 transition-colors\"\n            >\n              <div className=\"flex-1 min-w-0\">\n                <p className=\"font-medium truncate\">{bid.auction.asset.title}</p>\n                <div className=\"flex items-center gap-2 mt-1\">\n                  <span className=\"text-sm text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400\">\n                    Your bid: ${bid.amount.toFixed(2)}\n                  </span>\n                </div>\n              </div>\n              <div className=\"flex items-center gap-3\">\n                <div className=\"flex items-center gap-1 text-sm font-medium text-orange-600 dark:text-orange-400\">\n                  <Clock className=\"w-4 h-4\" />\n                  {countdowns[bid.id] || \"...\"}\n                </div>\n                <Button\n                  variant=\"ghost\"\n                  size=\"sm\"\n                  onClick={() => navigate(`/auctions/${bid.auction.id}`)}\n                >\n                  Bid\n                  <ArrowRight className=\"w-4 h-4 ml-1\" />\n                </Button>\n              </div>\n            </div>\n          ))}\n        </div>\n      </CardContent>\n    </Card>\n  )\n}\n```\n\n---\n\n### Component 4: WonAuctionsWidget.tsx (NEW - BIDDER)\n\n**File:** Excellent idea. The **Bid Proposal System** is a valuable feature for your platform.

But before I spec it out, I need clarity on 4 key questions:

---

## Answer These:

**Q1: Proposal Chat Scope**
Should the chat be:
- A) Simple messaging (like auction chat, just 2 people)
- B) Full direct messaging (broader system)
- C) Proposal-scoped only (closes when deal is made)

**Q2: After Proposal Accepted**
What happens next?
- A) They negotiate in chat, then manually create auction?
- B) Accept proposal â†’ auto-create auction at proposed price?
- C) Accept proposal â†’ just chat to finalize?

**Q3: Counter-Offers**
Should sellers be able to:
- A) Only Accept/Reject?
- B) Accept/Reject/Counter with different amount?

**Q4: Timeline**
Do you want:
- A) Just proposals now, chat later?
- B) Proposals + chat together?

---

Reply with those 4 answers and I'll spec **FEATURE 31 â€” Bid Proposal System** in full detail.

1/10/2026, 9:49:24 AM

Q1: Proposal Chat Scope Should the chat be: - decide yourself
Q2: After Proposal Accepted What happens next? C) Accept proposal â†’ just chat to finalize - it would be good to have finalization window to appropriately transfer the assets or related docs to make it offical that way we will be able to take up the platform charge as well and appropriatly finalize the trade without any descripancies and official records for later disputes. any trade done under the hood wont be the platforms responsibility.
Q3: Counter-Offers Should sellers be able to:
* B) Accept/Reject/Counter with different amount

Q4: Timeline Do you want:
* B) Proposals + chat together - need both but we will go one by one to not complicate the things in one go

return (\n    <Form {...form}>\n      <form onSubmit={form.handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className=\"space-y-4\">\n        <FormField\n          control={form.control}\n          name=\"proposedAmount\"\n
